raw: * The mixin controls the binding between model and item.
* @internal

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The mixin controls the binding between model and item.

raw: * The name of the property, where the value for the tree node/leaf label
* is stored in the model classes.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The name of the property, where the value for the tree node/leaf label is stored in the model classes.

raw: * The path to the property which holds the information that should be
* shown as an icon.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The path to the property which holds the information that should be shown as an icon.

raw: * A map containing the options for the label binding. The possible keys
* can be found in the {@link qx.data.SingleValueBinding} documentation.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A map containing the options for the label binding. The possible keys can be found in the {@link qx.data.SingleValueBinding} documentation.

raw: * A map containing the options for the icon binding. The possible keys

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A map containing the options for the icon binding. The possible keys can be found in the {@link qx.data.SingleValueBinding} documentation.

raw: * The name of the property, where the children are stored in the model.
* Instead of the {@link #labelPath} must the child property a direct
* property form the model instance.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The name of the property, where the children are stored in the model. Instead of the {@link #labelPath} must the child property a direct property form the model instance.

raw: * Delegation object, which can have one or more functions defined by the
* {@link qx.ui.tree.core.IVirtualTreeDelegate} interface.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Delegation object, which can have one or more functions defined by the {@link qx.ui.tree.core.IVirtualTreeDelegate} interface.

raw: * @type {Array} which contains the bounded items
* Helper-Method for binding the default properties from the model to the
* target widget. The used default properties  depends on the passed item.
* This method should only be called in the {@link IVirtualTreeDelegate#bindItem}
* function implemented by the {@link #delegate} property.
* @param item {qx.ui.core.Widget} The internally created and used node or
*   leaf.
* @param index {Integer} The index of the item (node or leaf).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper-Method for binding the default properties from the model to the target widget. The used default properties depends on the passed item. This method should only be called in the {@link IVirtualTreeDelegate#bindItem} function implemented by the {@link #delegate} property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
item {qx.ui.core.Widget} The internally created and used node or
   leaf.
@param.description:
The internally created and used node or
   leaf.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} The index of the item (node or leaf).
@param.description: The index of the item (node or leaf).

raw: * Helper-Method for binding a given property from the model to the target
* widget.
* This method should only be called in the {@link IVirtualTreeDelegate#bindItem}
* function implemented by the {@link #delegate} property.
* @param sourcePath {String | null} The path to the property in the model.
*   If you use an empty string, the whole model item will be bound.
* @param targetProperty {String} The name of the property in the target widget.
* @param options {Map | null} The options to use for the binding.
* @param targetWidget {qx.ui.core.Widget} The target widget.
* @param index {Integer} The index of the current binding.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper-Method for binding a given property from the model to the target widget. This method should only be called in the {@link IVirtualTreeDelegate#bindItem} function implemented by the {@link #delegate} property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
sourcePath {String | null} The path to the property in the model.
   If you use an empty string, the whole model item will be bound.
@param.description:
The path to the property in the model.
   If you use an empty string, the whole model item will be bound.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: targetProperty {String} The name of the property in the target widget.
@param.description: The name of the property in the target widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map | null} The options to use for the binding.
@param.description: The options to use for the binding.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: targetWidget {qx.ui.core.Widget} The target widget.
@param.description: The target widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} The index of the current binding.
@param.description: The index of the current binding.

raw: * Helper-Method for binding a given property from the target widget to
* the model.
* This method should only be called in the
* {@link qx.ui.tree.core.IVirtualTreeDelegate#bindItem} function implemented by the
* {@link #delegate} property.
* @param targetPath {String | null} The path to the property in the model.
* @param sourceProperty {String} The name of the property in the target.
* @param options {Map | null} The options to use for the binding.
* @param sourceWidget {qx.ui.core.Widget} The source widget.
* @param index {Integer} The index of the current binding.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper-Method for binding a given property from the target widget to the model. This method should only be called in the {@link qx.ui.tree.core.IVirtualTreeDelegate#bindItem} function implemented by the {@link #delegate} property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: targetPath {String | null} The path to the property in the model.
@param.description: The path to the property in the model.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: sourceProperty {String} The name of the property in the target.
@param.description: The name of the property in the target.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map | null} The options to use for the binding.
@param.description: The options to use for the binding.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: sourceWidget {qx.ui.core.Widget} The source widget.
@param.description: The source widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} The index of the current binding.
@param.description: The index of the current binding.
